title: Crime Alert 05.20.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.20.19
description:
Georgia woman stabbing her senior boyfriend to death in an old folks home. California man charges with grand theft for stealing avocados. Man arrested for playing basketball in the nude.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
